alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 23 at 2:49PM EDT until September 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding expected. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
